member.name: T:AnalogClock.TickStyle
member.summary: Defines the ticking style used for the second and minute hands of the analog clock.

member.name: F:AnalogClock.TickStyle.Smooth
member.summary: Smooth ticking style. For example if used with second hand it will be updated every millisecond.

member.name: F:AnalogClock.TickStyle.Normal
member.summary: Normal ticking style. For example if used with second hand it will be updated every second only.

member.name: T:AnalogClock.AnalogClock
member.summary: Represents the Analog clock control.

member.name: M:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instace of the Analog Clock control.

member.name: M:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.

member.name: M:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: M:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.DrawClock(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draws analog clock on the given GDI+ Drawing surface.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.FaceImage
member.summary: The Background image used in the clock face.
member.remarks: Using a large image will result in poor performance and increased memory consumption.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.SecondHandTickStyle
member.summary: Defines the second hand tick style.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.MinuteHandTickStyle
member.summary: Defines the minute hand tick style.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.DrawNumerals
member.summary: Determines whether the Numerals are drawn on the clock face.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.SmoothingMode
member.summary: Sets or gets the rendering quality of the clock.
member.remarks: This property does not effect the numeral text rendering quality. To set the numeral text rendering quality use the Property

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.TextRenderingHint
member.summary: Sets or gets the text rendering mode used for the clock numerals.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.DrawRim
member.summary: Determines whether the clock Rim is drawn or not.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.DrawDropShadow
member.summary: Determines whether drop shadow for the clock is drawn or not.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.DropShadowColor
member.summary: Sets or gets the color of the Drop Shadow.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.SecondHandDropShadowColor
member.summary: Sets or gets the color of the second hand drop Shadow.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.MinuteHandDropShadowColor
member.summary: Sets or gets the color of the Minute hand drop Shadow.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.HourHandDropShadowColor
member.summary: Sets or gets the color of the hour hand drop Shadow.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.FaceColorHigh
member.summary: Determines the first color of the clock face gradient.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.FaceColorLow
member.summary: Determines the second color of the clock face gradient.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.DrawSecondHandShadow
member.summary: Determines whether the second hand casts a drop shadow for added realism.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.DrawHourHandShadow
member.summary: Determines whether the hour hand casts a drop shadow for added realism.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.DrawMinuteHandShadow
member.summary: Determines whether the minute hand casts a drop shadow for added realism.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.RimColorHigh
member.summary: Determines the first color of the rim gradient.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.RimColorLow
member.summary: Determines the second color of the rim face gradient.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.RimGradientMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the direction of the Rim gradient.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.FaceGradientMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the direction of the Clock Face gradient.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.SecondHandEndCap
member.summary: Determines the Seconds hand end line shape.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.Time
member.summary: The System.DateTime structure which is used to display time.

example.code: AnalogClock clock = new AnalogClock(); clock.Time = DateTime.Now;

member.remarks: The clock face is updated every time the value of this property is changed.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.SecondHandColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the Seconds Hand.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.NumeralColor
member.summary: Sets or gets the color of the clock Numerals.
member.remarks: To change the numeral font use the Property

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.HourHandColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the Hour Hand.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.MinuteHandColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the Minute Hand.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.DrawSecondHand
member.summary: Determines whether the second Hand is shown.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.DrawMinuteHand
member.summary: Determines whether the minute hand is shown.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.DrawHourHand
member.summary: Determines whether the hour Hand is shown.

member.name: P:AnalogClock.AnalogClock.DropShadowOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the drop shadow offset.
